original_title: Orgullo y sororidad. Voces de mujeres LTB
overview: A documentary made in the context of the 2019 LGTBI Pride, focused on the role and vision of women in the face of this image of pride as a protest party led by cis-gay men for cis-gay men.
title: Orgullo y sororidad. Voces de mujeres LTB
